posts.title: 题解02
posts.text: 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627**1**** 、注册：**[https://krsys.org/m/R98ef8](https://krsys.org/m/R98ef8)语言可以换成简体中文。![](RackMultipart20210917-4-h4q1rp_html_9310c78583d04ffd.png) ![](RackMultipart20210917-4-h4q1rp_html_78a9d53749d091b1.gif)**2**** 、下载登录：**下载krsys手机APP，并使用邮箱与密码登录，即可启动矿机， **同时记得每**** 24 ****小时回来收矿一次！****3**** 、邮箱认证：**邮箱必须认证，不然没办法收矿！打开APP——挖矿——复制字符串（点击一下字符串就可以复制）——用你注册邮箱发送邮件到 active@krsys.org （注意：邮件主题与内容一致）——收到回复邮件" **KrSys: verify passed** Congratulations, your email has been verified, and it is one step closer to starting mining! Yours kr-system."即表示认证通过，如图所示： ![](RackMultipart20210917-4-h4q1rp_html_fc4919993263006e.png) ![](RackMultipart20210917-4-h4q1rp_html_206a1f8091b0e967.gif)**如果没有收到回复邮件，请看垃圾箱或者是否被拦截了。****4**** 、电脑挖矿：**官网下载：打开官网 https://krsys.org ——DOWNLOADS——下载WIN MINER（NEW RELEASE）（解压密码：111）国内下载：[https://wsk994.lanzous.com/iJgTHks27da](https://wsk994.lanzous.com/iJgTHks27da)解压完成后运行：第一行填钱包地址。挖矿可以选择cpu或者gpu,然后点start即可挖矿。（最好魔法尚枉，效率高）![](RackMultipart20210917-4-h4q1rp_html_1955d583cde771fc.png) ![](RackMultipart20210917-4-h4q1rp_html_a9e5b05b24af7a22.gif)

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
